 7	import { Menu, X, User, LogIn } from 'lucide-react'
 8	import Button from '../ui/Button'
 9	
 10	export default function Header() {
 11	 const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false)
 12	
 13	 const toggleMenu = () => setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen)
 14	
 15	 const scrollToSection = (sectionId: string) => {
 16	 const element = document.getElementById(sectionId)
 17	 if (element) {
 18	 element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' })
 19	 }
 20	 setIsMenuOpen(false)
 21	 }
 22	
 23	 const navItems = [
 24	 { name: 'Home', href: '#hero' },
 25	 { name: 'How It Works', href: '#how-it-works' },
 26	 { name: 'Benefits', href: '#benefits' },
 27	 { name: 'Contact', href: '#contact' },
 28	 ]
 29	
 30	 return (
 31	 <motion.header
 32	 initial={{ y: -100, opacity: 0 }}
 33	 animate={{ y: 0, opacity: 1 }}
 34	 transition={{ duration: 0.6 }}

 36	 >
 37	 <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto">
 38	 <div className="flex items-center justify-between py-2 xs:py-3 px-3 xs:px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 2xl:px-12">
 39	 {/* Logo */}
 40	 <motion.div
 41	 whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
 42	 className="flex items-center"
 43	 >
 44	 <Link href="/" className="flex items-center">
 45	 <div className="relative w-28 h-8 xs:w-32 xs:h-9 sm:w-36 sm:h-10 md:w-40 md:h-11 lg:w-44 lg:h-12">

Path: components/ui/Button.tsx
 1	'use client'
 2	
 3	import { motion } from 'framer-motion'
 4	import Link from 'next/link'
 5	import { ReactNode } from 'react'
 6	
 7	interface ButtonProps {
 8	 children: ReactNode
 9	 variant?: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'outline'
 10	 size?: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg'
 11	 href?: string
 12	 onClick?: () => void
 13	 className?: string
 14	 disabled?: boolean
 15	 type?: 'button' | 'submit' | 'reset'
 16	}
 17	
 18	export default function Button({
 19	 children,
 20	 variant = 'primary',
 21	 size = 'md',
 22	 href,
 23	 onClick,
 24	 className = '',
 25	 disabled = false,
 26	 type = 'button',
 27	}: ButtonProps) {
 28	 const baseClasses = 'inline-flex items-center justify-center font-semibold rounded-lg transition-all duration-300 transform hover:scale-105 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2'
 29	 
 30	 const variantClasses = {
 31	 primary: 'bg-primary hover:bg-blue-600 text-white focus:ring-primary',
 32	 secondary: 'bg-accent hover:bg-green-600 text-white focus:ring-accent',
 33	 outline: 'border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white focus:ring-primary',
 34	 }
 35	 
 36	 const sizeClasses = {
 37	 sm: 'py-2 px-3 xs:px-4 text-xs xs:text-sm sm:text-base',
 38	 md: 'py-2.5 px-4 xs:py-3 xs:px-6 text-sm xs:text-base sm:text-lg',
 39	 lg: 'py-3 px-6 xs:py-4 xs:px-8 text-base xs:text-lg sm:text-xl',
 40	 }
 41	 
 42	 const classes = `${baseClasses} ${variantClasses[variant]} ${sizeClasses[size]} ${className} ${
 43	 disabled ? 'opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed' : ''
 44	 }`
 45	
 46	 const buttonContent = (
 47	 <motion.button
 48	 type={type}
 49	 className={classes}
 50	 onClick={onClick}
 51	 disabled={disabled}
 52	 whileHover={{ scale: disabled ? 1 : 1.05 }}
 53	 whileTap={{ scale: disabled ? 1 : 0.95 }}
 54	 >
 55	 {children}
 56	 </motion.button>
 57	 )
 58	
 59	 if (href && !disabled) {
 60	 return (
 61	 <Link href={href}>
 62	 {buttonContent}
 63	 </Link>
 64	 )
 65	 }
 66	
 67	 return buttonContent
 68	}...

 1	# Gurtoy Referral Landing Page
 2	
 3	A modern, professional, and mobile-responsive landing page for Gurtoy's referral-based platform built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.
 4	
 5	## Features
 6	
 7	- **Modern Design**: Clean, professional UI with smooth animations
 8	- **Fully Responsive**: Optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
 9	- **Performance Optimized**: Built with Next.js 14 and App Router
 10	- **Smooth Animations**: Powered by Framer Motion
 11	- **SEO Optimized**: Meta tags, structured data, and semantic HTML
 12	- **Production Ready**: Optimized for Vercel deployment
 13	
 14	## Tech Stack

 145	 const handleWithdrawRequest = async () => {
 146	 if (!wallet || !withdrawAmount) return

 150	 if (amount < 500 || amount >= availableBalance) return
 151

 153	 setRequesting(true)
 154	 const { error } = await supabase
 155	 .from('withdrawals')
 156	 .insert({
 157	 user_id: userId,
 158	 amount: amount,
 159	 bank_details: {
 160	 account_holder: wallet.bank_account_holder,
 161	 account_number: wallet.bank_account_number,
 162	 ifsc: wallet.bank_ifsc,
 163	 upi_id: wallet.upi_id
 164	 }
 165	 })
 166	
 167	 if (error) throw error
 168	
 169	 // Create notification for withdrawal request
 170	 await supabase
 171	 .from('notifications')
 172	 .insert({
 173	 user_id: userId,
 174	 type: 'withdrawal_processed',
 175	 title: 'Withdrawal Request Submitted',
 176	 message: `Your withdrawal request of ₹${amount.toFixed(2)} has been submitted and is under review.`
 177	 })
 178	
 179	 // Immediately update the available balance to reflect the pending withdrawal
 180	 setEarningsData(prev => ({
 181	 ...prev,
 182	 availableBalance: prev.availableBalance - amount
 183	 }))
 184	
 185	 // Refresh withdrawals list and recalculate earnings
 186	 await fetchWithdrawals()
 187	 await calculateEarnings()
 188	 setShowRequestModal(false)
 189	 setWithdrawAmount('')
 190	 } catch (error) {
 191	 console.error('Error requesting withdrawal:', error)
 192	 } finally {
 193	 setRequesting(false)
 194	 }

 47	export default function TabNavigation({

 57	 const Icon = tab.icon

 59

 62	 key={tab.id}

 64	 className={`
 65	 relative flex items-center space-x-2 px-4 py-3 rounded-lg font-medium transition-all duration-200
 66	 ${isActive 
 67	 ? 'text-primary bg-primary/10'

 69	 }
 70	 `}
 71	 whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}

Path: components/ui/Button.tsx
 1	'use client'
 2	
 3	import { motion } from 'framer-motion'
 4	import Link from 'next/link'
 5	import { ReactNode } from 'react'
 6	
 7	interface ButtonProps {
 8	 children: ReactNode
 9	 variant?: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'outline'
 10	 size?: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg'
 11	 href?: string
 12	 onClick?: () => void
 13	 className?: string
 14	 disabled?: boolean
 15	 type?: 'button' | 'submit' | 'reset'
 16	}
 17	
 18	export default function Button({
 19	 children,
 20	 variant = 'primary',
 21	 size = 'md',
 22	 href,
 23	 onClick,
 24	 className = '',
 25	 disabled = false,
 26	 type = 'button',
 27	}: ButtonProps) {
 28	 const baseClasses = 'inline-flex items-center justify-center font-semibold rounded-lg transition-all duration-300 transform hover:scale-105 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2'
 29	 
 30	 const variantClasses = {
 31	 primary: 'bg-primary hover:bg-blue-600 text-white focus:ring-primary',
 32	 secondary: 'bg-accent hover:bg-green-600 text-white focus:ring-accent',
 33	 outline: 'border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white focus:ring-primary',
 34	 }
 35	 
 36	 const sizeClasses = {
 37	 sm: 'py-2 px-3 xs:px-4 text-xs xs:text-sm sm:text-base',
 38	 md: 'py-2.5 px-4 xs:py-3 xs:px-6 text-sm xs:text-base sm:text-lg',
 39	 lg: 'py-3 px-6 xs:py-4 xs:px-8 text-base xs:text-lg sm:text-xl',
 40	 }
 41	 
 42	 const classes = `${baseClasses} ${variantClasses[variant]} ${sizeClasses[size]} ${className} ${
 43	 disabled ? 'opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed' : ''
 44	 }`
 45	
 46	 const buttonContent = (
 47	 <motion.button
 48	 type={type}
 49	 className={classes}
 50	 onClick={onClick}
 51	 disabled={disabled}
 52	 whileHover={{ scale: disabled ? 1 : 1.05 }}
 53	 whileTap={{ scale: disabled ? 1 : 0.95 }}
 54	 >
 55	 {children}
 56	 </motion.button>
 57	 )
 58	
 59	 if (href && !disabled) {
 60	 return (
 61	 <Link href={href}>
 62	 {buttonContent}
 63	 </Link>
 64	 )
 65	 }
 66	
 67	 return buttonContent
 68	}...

 20	import WithdrawalsTab from '../../components/dashboard/WithdrawalsTab'
 21	import NoticesTab from '../../components/dashboard/NoticesTab'
 22

 25	import type { Profile, Wallet, DashboardTab as TabType, Notification } from '../../lib/supabase/types'
 26	
 27	export default function DashboardPage() {
 28	 const router = useRouter()

 31	 const [wallet, setWallet] = useState<Wallet | null>(null)

 1	// Shared DB types and helpers
 2	export type KycStatus = 'pending' | 'approved' | 'rejected'
 3	export type OrderStatus = 'processing' | 'delivered' | 'pending'
 4	export type WithdrawalStatus = 'pending' | 'processed' | 'rejected'
 5	export type ReferralRequestStatus = 'pending' | 'approved' | 'rejected'
 6	export type NotificationType = 'kyc_submitted' | 'kyc_approved' | 'kyc_rejected' | 'referral_code_requested' | 'referral_generated' | 'referral_sale' | 'commission_added' | 'withdrawal_processed' | 'withdrawal_rejected'

 9	 id: string // auth.user id

 11	 phone: string

 16	 selfie_url: string | null
 17	 profile_image: string | null
 18	 created_at: string

 67	 updated_at: string
 68	}
 69

 1	"use client"
 2	
 3	import { useState } from 'react'
 4	import { motion } from 'framer-motion'
 5	import Link from 'next/link'
 6	import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation'
 7	import { ArrowLeft, User, Mail, Phone, Lock } from 'lucide-react'
 8	import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'
 9	import { supabase } from '../../lib/supabase/client'
 10	import { validateRegistrationForm, sanitizeInput } from '../../lib/validation'
 11	
 12	export default function RegisterPage() {
 13	 const router = useRouter()
 14	 const [fullName, setFullName] = useState('')
 15	 const [email, setEmail] = useState('')
 16	 const [phone, setPhone] = useState('')
 17	 const [password, setPassword] = useState('')
 18	 const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState('')
 19	 const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null)
 20	 const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false)
 21	 const [successMsg, setSuccessMsg] = useState<string | null>(null)
 22	
 23	 const validate = (): boolean => {
 24	 setError(null)
 25	
 26	 // Use enhanced validation
 27	 const validation = validateRegistrationForm({
 28	 fullName: sanitizeInput(fullName),
 29	 email: sanitizeInput(email),
 30	 phone: sanitizeInput(phone),
 31	 password,
 32	 confirmPassword
 33	 })
 34	
 35	 if (!validation.isValid) {
 36	 setError(validation.error || 'Validation failed')
 37	 return false
 38	 }
 39	
 40	 return true
 41	 }
 42	
 43	 const onSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
 44	 e.preventDefault()
 45	 if (!validate()) return
 46	 setLoading(true)
 47	
 48	 const { error: signErr } = await supabase.auth.signUp({
 49	 email,
 50	 password,
 51	 options: {
 52	 emailRedirectTo: `${window.location.origin}/verify`,
 53	 data: { full_name: fullName, phone },
 54	 },
 55	 })
 56	
 57	 if (signErr) {
 58	 setError(signErr.message)
 59	 setLoading(false)
 60	 return
 61	 }
 62	
 63	 setSuccessMsg('Account created! Please verify your email to proceed.')

Path: admin-panel/DEPLOYMENT.md
 1	# GurToy Admin Panel - Deployment Guide
 2	
 3	## Pre-deployment Checklist
 4	
 5	### 1. Supabase Setup
 6	- [ ] Supabase project created and configured
 7	- [ ] Database schema applied from `../supabase/schema.sql`
 8	- [ ] Row Level Security (RLS) policies enabled
 9	- [ ] Storage buckets created (`aadhaar`, `selfie`)
 10	- [ ] Admin user created with email: `thegurtoy@gmail.com`
 11	
 12	### 2. Environment Variables
 13	- [ ] `.env.local` configured with correct Supabase credentials
 14	- [ ] Environment variables verified in production environment
 15	
 16	### 3. Code Review
 17	- [ ] All TypeScript errors resolved
 18	- [ ] All components properly typed
 19	- [ ] Authentication flow tested
 20	- [ ] Route protection verified
 21	
 22	## Deployment Steps
 23	
 24	### Option 1: Vercel Deployment (Recommended)
 25	
 26	1. **Connect Repository**
 27	 ```bash
 28	 # Push code to GitHub
 29	 git init
 30	 git add .
 31	 git commit -m "Initial admin panel setup"
 32	 git branch -M main
 33	 git remote add origin https://github.com/yourusername/gurtoy-admin-panel.git
 34	 git push -u origin main
 35	 ```
 36	
 37	2. **Deploy to Vercel**
 38	 - Go to [vercel.com](https://vercel.com)
 39	 - Import your GitHub repository
 40	 - Configure environment variables:
 41	 - `NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL`
 42	 - `NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY`
 43	 - Deploy
 44	
 45	3. **Custom Domain (Optional)**
 46	 - Add custom domain in Vercel dashboard
 47	 - Configure DNS settings
 48	 - Enable SSL (automatic with Vercel)
 49	
 50	### Option 2: Manual Deployment
 51	
 52	1. **Build the Application**
 53	 ```bash
 54	 npm run build
 55	 ```
 56	
 57	2. **Start Production Server**
 58	 ```bash
 59	 npm start
 60	 ```
 61	
 62	3. **Use Process Manager (PM2)**
 63	 ```bash
 64	 npm install -g pm2
 65	 pm2 start npm --name "gurtoy-admin" -- start
 66	 pm2 save
 67	 pm2 startup
 68	 ```
 69	
 70	## Post-deployment Verification
 71	
 72	### 1. Authentication Test
 73	- [ ] Admin login works with correct credentials
 74	- [ ] Unauthorized access is blocked
 75	- [ ] Route protection is active
 76	
 77	### 2. Functionality Test
 78	- [ ] Dashboard loads with correct stats
 79	- [ ] User & KYC management works
 80	- [ ] Add referral sale functionality works
 81	- [ ] Withdrawal processing works
 82	- [ ] Notice management works
 83	
 84	### 3. Security Verification
 85	- [ ] All routes require authentication
 86	- [ ] Sensitive data is properly masked
 87	- [ ] Database queries use RLS
 88	- [ ] No sensitive information in client-side code
 89	
 90	## Production Configuration
 91	
 92	### 1. Environment Variables
 93	```bash
 94	# Production .env.local
 95	NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=https://your-project.supabase.co
 96	NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=your-anon-key
 97	```
 98	
 99	### 2. Next.js Configuration
 100	```javascript
 101	// next.config.js
 102	/** @type {import('next').NextConfig} */
 103	const nextConfig = {
 104	 experimental: {
 105	 appDir: true,
 106	 },
 107	 images: {
 108	 domains: ['your-project.supabase.co'],
 109	 },
 110	 // Enable compression
 111	 compress: true,
 112	 // Optimize for production
 113	 swcMinify: true,
 114	}

 178	## Rollback Plan
 179	
 180	1. **Immediate Rollback**
 181	 ```bash
 182	 # Vercel
 183	 vercel --prod --rollback
 184	 
 185	 # Manual
 186	 git checkout previous-stable-tag
 187	 npm run build
 188	 pm2 restart gurtoy-admin
 189	 ```
 190	
 191	2. **Database Rollback**
 192	 - Restore from Supabase backup
 193	 - Apply necessary migrations
 194	 - Verify data integrity

 67	
 68	## Getting Started
 69	
 70	### Prerequisites
 71	- Node.js 18+ 
 72	- npm or yarn
 73	
 74	### Installation
 75	
 76	1. Clone the repository:
 77	```bash
 78	git clone <repository-url>
 79	cd gurtoy-refer
 80	```
 81	
 82	2. Install dependencies:
 83	```bash
 84	npm install
 85	# or
 86	yarn install
 87	```
 88	
 89	3. Run the development server:
 90	```bash
 91	npm run dev
 92	# or
 93	yarn dev
 94	```
 95	
 96	4. Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) in your browser.
 97	
 98	### Build for Production
 99	
 100	```bash
 101	npm run build
 102	npm start
 103	```
 104	
 105	## Project Structure
 106	
 107	```
 108	gurtoy-refer/
 109	├── app/
 110	│ ├── globals.css
 111	│ ├── layout.tsx
 112	│ ├── page.tsx
 113	│ ├── login/
 114	│ │ └── page.tsx
 115	│ └── register/
 116	│ └── page.tsx
 117	├── components/
 118	│ ├── layout/
 119	│ │ ├── Header.tsx
 120	│ │ └── Footer.tsx
 121	│ └── ui/
 122	│ └── Button.tsx
 123	├── public/
 124	├── package.json
 125	├── tailwind.config.js
 126	├── tsconfig.json
 127	└── next.config.js
 128	```
 129	
 130	## Deployment
 131	
 132	This project is optimized for Vercel deployment:
 133	
 134	1. Push your code to GitHub
 135	2. Connect your repository to Vercel
 136	3. Deploy with zero configuration
 137	
 138	### Environment Variables
 139	
 140	No environment variables are required for the landing page.
 141

 15	
 16	- **Frontend**: React + Next.js 14 (App Router)
 17	- **Backend**: Supabase (Auth, Database, Storage)
 18	- **UI Framework**: Tailwind CSS + Custom Components
 19	- **Authentication**: Supabase Auth
 20	- **Deployment**: Vercel (Frontend), Supabase (Backend)
 21	
 22	## Admin Credentials
 23	
 24	- **Email**: thegurtoy@gmail.com
 25	- **Password**: Toys123@
 26	
 27	## Getting Started
 28	
 29	1. **Install Dependencies**
 30	 ```bash
 31	 npm install
 32	 ```
 33	
 34	2. **Database Setup**
 35	 - Run the complete schema: `../supabase/schema.sql` in Supabase SQL Editor
 36	 - This single file includes all tables, policies, and admin access
 37	 - Create storage bucket: `aadhaar` (for all KYC documents - if not auto-created)
 38	 - Ensure admin user exists with email: `thegurtoy@gmail.com`
 39	
 40	3. **Environment Setup**
 41	 - Copy `.env.local` and update Supabase credentials if needed
 42	
 43	3. **Run Development Server**
 44	 ```bash
 45	 npm run dev
 46	 ```
 47	 The admin panel will be available at `http://localhost:3001`
 48	
 49	4. **Build for Production**
 50	 ```bash
 51	 npm run build
 52	 npm start
 53	 ```

 117	
 118	The admin panel works with the following main tables:
 119	- `users` - User profiles and KYC status
 120	- `wallets` - User wallet balances and earnings
 121	- `orders` - Referral sales and commissions
 122	- `withdrawals` - Withdrawal requests and processing
 123	- `notices` - System notices and announcements
 124	- `notifications` - User notifications
 125	
 126	## Deployment
 127	
 128	### Vercel Deployment
 129	1. Connect your GitHub repository to Vercel
 130	2. Set environment variables in Vercel dashboard
 131	3. Deploy automatically on push to main branch
 132	
 133	### Environment Variables
 134	```
 135	NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=your_supabase_url
 136	NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=your_supabase_anon_key
 137	```

 139	## Support

 141	For technical support or questions about the admin panel, contact the development team.

 137	
 138	### Admin Can't See User Data
 139	- **Cause**: Schema not fully applied or admin user doesn't exist
 140	- **Solution**: Ensure `../supabase/schema.sql` was run completely and admin user exists
 141	
 142	### Login Fails
 143	- **Cause**: Admin user doesn't exist or wrong credentials
 144	- **Solution**: Create user `thegurtoy@gmail.com` in Supabase Auth dashboard
 145	
 146	### Images Don't Load
 147	- **Cause**: Storage bucket not created or wrong permissions
 148	- **Solution**: Create `aadhaar` bucket, ensure admin policies applied
 149	
 150	### Console Errors
 151	- **Cause**: Environment variables not set correctly
 152	- **Solution**: Check `.env.local` has correct Supabase URL and keys
 153

 156	For production deployment:
